text: avan (phir'aun) paṟaññu: ñān niṅṅaḷkk anuvādaṁ tarunnatin mumpāyi niṅṅaḷ avanil ‍viśvasiccuvennēā? tīrccayāyuṁ ivan niṅṅaḷkk jālavidya paṭhippicca niṅṅaḷuṭe talavan tanneyāṇ vaḻiye niṅṅaḷ aṟiññu keāḷḷuṁ tīrccayāyuṁ niṅṅaḷuṭe kaikaḷuṁ, niṅṅaḷuṭe kālukaḷuṁ etir ‍vaśaṅṅaḷilninnāyikkeāṇṭ ñān muṟiccu kaḷayukayuṁ, niṅṅaḷe muḻuvan ñān krūśikkukayuṁ ceyyunnatāṇ‌
